verses.verse: And there happened<WH7122> to be there a man<WH376> of Belial<WH1100>, whose name<WH8034> was Sheba<WH7652>, the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075>, a Benjamite<WH1145>: and he blew<WH8628> a trumpet<WH7782>, and said<WH559>, We have no part<WH2506> in David<WH1732>, neither have we inheritance<WH5159> in the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448>: every<WH376> man<WH376> to his tents<WH168>, O Israel<WH3478>.

¶ And David<WH1732> came<WH935> to his house<WH1004> at Jerusalem<WH3389>; and the king<WH4428> took<WH3947> the ten<WH6235> women<WH802> his concubines<WH6370>, whom he had left<WH3240> to keep<WH8104> the house<WH1004>, and put<WH5414> them in ward<WH4931>, and fed<WH3557> them, but went not in<WH935> unto them. ¶ Then said<WH559> the king<WH4428> to Amasa<WH6021>, Assemble<WH2199> me the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> within three<WH7969> days<WH3117>, and be thou here present<WH5975>.

And there went out<WH3318> after<WH310> him Joab's<WH3097> men<WH582>, and the Cherethites<WH3774>, and the Pelethites<WH6432>, and all the mighty men<WH1368>: and they went out<WH3318> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, to pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> Sheba<WH7652> the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075>.

And Joab<WH3097> said<WH559> to Amasa<WH6021>, Art thou in health<WH7965>, my brother<WH251>? And Joab<WH3097> took<WH270> Amasa<WH6021> by the beard<WH2206> with the right<WH3225> hand<WH3027> to kiss<WH5401> him.

But Amasa<WH6021> took no heed<WH8104> to the sword<WH2719> that was in Joab's<WH3097> hand<WH3027>: so he smote<WH5221> him therewith in the fifth<WH2570> rib, and shed out<WH8210> his bowels<WH4578> to the ground<WH776>, and struck him not again<WH8138>; and he died<WH4191>. So Joab<WH3097> and Abishai<WH52> his brother<WH251> pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> Sheba<WH7652> the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075>.

And one<WH376> of Joab's<WH3097> men<WH5288> stood<WH5975> by him, and said<WH559>, He<WH4310> that favoureth<WH2654> Joab<WH3097>, and he that is for David<WH1732>, let him go after<WH310> Joab<WH3097>.

And when the man<WH376> saw<WH7200> that all the people<WH5971> stood still<WH5975>, he removed<WH5437> Amasa<WH6021> out of the highway<WH4546> into the field<WH7704>, and cast<WH7993> a cloth<WH899> upon him, when he saw<WH7200> that every one that came<WH935> by him stood still<WH5975>.

¶ And he went<WH5674> through all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> unto Abel<WH59>, and to Beth-maachah<WH1038>, and all the Berites<WH1276>: and they were gathered together<WH6950><WH7035>, and went<WH935> also after<WH310> him.

¶ Then cried<WH7121> a wise<WH2450> woman<WH802> out of the city<WH5892>, Hear<WH8085>, hear<WH8085>; say<WH559>, I pray you, unto Joab<WH3097>, Come near<WH7126> hither, that I may speak<WH1696> with thee.

And when he was come near<WH7126> unto her, the woman<WH802> said<WH559>, Art thou Joab<WH3097>? And he answered<WH559>, I am he. Then she said<WH559> unto him, Hear<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of thine handmaid<WH519>. And he answered<WH559>, I do hear<WH8085>.

Then she spake<WH559>, saying<WH559>, They were wont<WH1696> to speak<WH1696> in old time<WH7223>, saying<WH559>, They shall surely<WH7592> ask<WH7592> counsel at Abel<WH59>: and so they ended<WH8552> the matter.

I am one of them that are peaceable<WH7999> and faithful<WH539> in Israel<WH3478>: thou seekest<WH1245> to destroy<WH4191> a city<WH5892> and a mother<WH517> in Israel<WH3478>: why wilt thou swallow up<WH1104> the inheritance<WH5159> of the LORD<WH3068>?

The matter<WH1697> is not so: but a man<WH376> of mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669>, Sheba<WH7652> the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075> by name<WH8034>, hath lifted up<WH5375> his hand<WH3027> against the king<WH4428>, even against David<WH1732>: deliver<WH5414> him only, and I will depart<WH3212> from the city<WH5892>. And the woman<WH802> said<WH559> unto Joab<WH3097>, Behold, his head<WH7218> shall be thrown<WH7993> to thee over<WH1157> the wall<WH2346>.

Then the woman<WH802> went<WH935> unto all the people<WH5971> in her wisdom<WH2451>. And they cut off<WH3772> the head<WH7218> of Sheba<WH7652> the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075>, and cast<WH7993> it out to Joab<WH3097>. And Joab<WH3097> returned<WH7725> to Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the king<WH4428>.
¶ Now Joab<WH3097> was over all the host<WH6635> of Israel<WH3478>: and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077> was over the Cherethites<WH3774><WH3746> and over the Pelethites<WH6432>:
